physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 13 x 53, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 57 x 24, (A) 3 lines, top right margins, (B) blank, (3) 52 x 39, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (4) 44 x 26, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 36 x 33, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) 5 lines, right margin, (6) 47 x 21, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) traces, (7) 40 x 35, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 26 x 17, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 23 x 45, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 23 x 25, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (b) blank, (11) 34 x 29, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 2 lines, (12) 40 x 32, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (13) 67 x 67, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (14) 61 x 64, (A) 1 line, left top margins, (B) 5 lines, left margin, (15) 95 x 32, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (16) 67 x 60, (A) 1 line, right (?) bottom margins
